jobActions.name: Ruin
jobActions.description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 240.

jobActions.name: Summon Carbuncle
jobActions.description: Summons Carbuncle to your side.

jobActions.name: Radiant Aegis
jobActions.description:
Orders Carbuncle to execute Radiant Aegis.
Radiant Aegis Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage totaling 20% of your maximum HP
Duration: 30s
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be executed while Carbuncle is summoned.

jobActions.name: Physick
jobActions.description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 400

jobActions.name: Aethercharge
jobActions.description:
Grants Aethercharge, increasing the potency of Ruin, Ruin II, and Ruin III by 50, and Outburst by 20.
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants Ruby Arcanum, Topaz Arcanum, and Emerald Arcanum
Can only be executed in combat and while Carbuncle is summoned.

jobActions.name: Summon Ruby
jobActions.description:
Summons Ruby Carbuncle, and orders it to execute Glittering Ruby.
Glittering Ruby Effect: Rushes target and deals fire damage with a potency of 400
Additional Effect: Grants 2 stacks of Fire Attunement
Fire Attunement Effect: Gemshine and Precious Brilliance become fire-aspected
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Ruby Arcanum and Carbuncle is summoned.
Current pet will leave the battlefield while Ruby Carbuncle is present, and return once gone.

jobActions.name: Gemshine
jobActions.description:
Channel the energies of your active elemental attunement to attack your enemy.
Fire Attunement Effect: Deal fire damage to a single target
Earth Attunement Effect: Deal earth damage to a single target
Wind Attunement Effect: Deal wind damage to a single target

jobActions.name: Ruby Ruin
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 340.
Fire Attunement Cost: 1
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Fester
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 340.
Aetherflow Gauge Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Energy Drain
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 200.
Additional Effect: Aetherflow II
Additional Effect: Grants Further Ruin
Duration: 60s
Shares a recast timer with Energy Siphon.

jobActions.name: Resurrection
jobActions.description: Resurrects target to a weakened state.

jobActions.name: Summon Topaz
jobActions.description:
Summons Topaz Carbuncle, and orders it to execute Glittering Topaz.
Glittering Topaz Effect: Rushes target and deals earth damage with a potency of 400
Additional Effect: Grants 4 stacks of Earth Attunement
Earth Attunement Effect: Gemshine and Precious Brilliance become earth-aspected
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Topaz Arcanum and Carbuncle is summoned.
Current pet will leave the battlefield while Topaz Carbuncle is present, and return once gone.

jobActions.name: Topaz Ruin
jobActions.description:

※Tri-disaster changes to Astral Flare when requirements for execution are met.

jobActions.name: Astral Flow
jobActions.description:
Channel the energies of your active trance or elemental favor to perform one of several actions.
Dreadwyrm Trance Effect: Action changes to Deathflare
Lightwyrm Trance Effect: Action changes to Sunflare
Firebird Trance Effect: Action changes to Rekindle
Ifrit's Favor Effect: Action changes to Crimson Cyclone
Titan's Favor Effect: Action changes to Mountain Buster
Garuda's Favor Effect: Action changes to Slipstream
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Deathflare
jobActions.description:

traits.name: Enhanced Aethercharge
traits.description: Grants Ruby Arcanum and Topaz Arcanum upon executing Aethercharge.

traits.name: Maim and Mend
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%. Also increases base damage and HP restoration of your pet by 10%.

traits.name: Enhanced Aethercharge II
traits.description: Grants Ruby Arcanum, Topaz Arcanum, and Emerald Arcanum upon executing Aethercharge.

traits.name: Ruin Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Ruin to Ruin II.

traits.name: Ruby Summoning Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Summon Ruby to Summon Ifrit.

traits.name: Topaz Summoning Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Summon Topaz to Summon Titan.

traits.name: Maim and Mend II
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%. Also increases base damage and HP restoration of your pet by 30%.

traits.name: Emerald Summoning Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Summon Emerald to Summon Garuda.

traits.name: Enkindle
traits.description: Enhances the signature attack of summons, upgrading Ifrit-Egi's Burning Strike to Inferno, Titan-Egi's Rock Buster to Earthen Fury, and Garuda-Egi's Aerial Slash to Aerial Blast.

traits.name: Ruin Mastery II
traits.description: Upgrades Ruin II to Ruin III.

traits.name: Aethercharge Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Aethercharge to Dreadwyrm Trance.

traits.name: Enhanced Energy Siphon
traits.description: Grants Further Ruin upon executing Energy Drain or Energy Siphon.

traits.name: Enhanced Dreadwyrm Trance
traits.description: Upgrades Dreadwyrm Trance to Summon Bahamut.

traits.name: Ruin Mastery III
traits.description:
Enhances Gemshine according to your current elemental attunement.
Fire Attunement Upgrade: Ruby Rite
Earth Attunement Upgrade: Topaz Rite
Wind Attunement Upgrade: Emerald Rite

traits.name: Outburst Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Outburst to Tri-disaster.

traits.name: Enhanced Summon Bahamut
traits.description: Upgrades Summon Bahamut to Summon Phoenix when Demi-Bahamut returns from summoning.

traits.name: Outburst Mastery II
traits.description:
Enhances Precious Brilliance according to your current elemental attunement.
Fire Attunement Upgrade: Ruby Catastrophe
Earth Attunement Upgrade: Topaz Catastrophe
Wind Attunement Upgrade: Emerald Catastrophe

traits.name: Ruin Mastery IV
traits.description: Increases the potency of Ruin III to 310, Ruby Rite to 510, Topaz Rite to 330, and Emerald Rite to 230.

traits.name: Elemental Mastery
traits.description:
Grants Ifrit's Favor upon executing Summon Ifrit, Titan's Favor upon executing Topaz Rite or Topaz Catastrophe, and Garuda's Favor upon executing Summon Garuda.
Enhances Astral Flow according to your current elemental favor.
Ifrit's Favor Upgrade: Crimson Cyclone
Titan's Favor Upgrade: Mountain Buster
Garuda's Favor Upgrade: Slipstream

traits.name: Enhanced Radiant Aegis
traits.description:
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Radiant Aegis.
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Enkindle II
traits.description: Upgrades Summon Ifrit to Summon Ifrit II, Summon Titan to Summon Titan II, and Summon Garuda to Summon Garuda II.

traits.name: Enhanced Fester
traits.description: Upgrades Fester to Necrotize.

traits.name: Arcane Mastery
traits.description: Increases the potency of Ruin III to 360, Astral Impulse to 500, Ruin IV to 490, Ruby Rite to 540, Topaz Rite to 340, Emerald Rite to 240, Fountain of Fire to 580, Crimson Strike to 490, Crimson Cyclone to 490, Mountain Buster to 160, Slipstream to 490, Inferno to 800, Earthen Fury to 800, and Aerial Blast to 800.

traits.name: Enhanced Searing Light
traits.description:
Grants Ruby's Glimmer after executing Searing Light.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Enhanced Summon Bahamut II
traits.description: Allows the summoning of Solar Bahamut in addition to Demi-Phoenix and Demi-Bahamut.
